mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reply(reply_no, feed_no, member_id, reply_content, reply_date) VALUES (REPLY_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{feedNo}, (SELECT member_id FROM member WHERE nickname=#{nickname}), #{replyContent}, SYSDATE)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM like_table WHERE feed_no=#{feedNo} AND member_id=#{memberId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO log(log_no, log_time, log_uri, member_id, log_keyword, feed_no, log_like_check) VALUES (LOG_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, SYSDATE, #{logURI}, #{memberId}, #{logKeyword, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{feedNo, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{logLikeCheck, jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select * from (select f.feed_no as "feedNo", f.member_id as "memberId", f.feed_content as "feedContent", f.upload_date as "uploadDate", f.place_detail as "placeDetail", p.place_title AS "placeTitle", (select count(*) from like_table where feed_no = f.feed_no) as "likeCount", row_number() over(order by f.upload_date desc) as num from feed f LEFT OUTER JOIN place p ON f.place_detail=p.place_detail where member_id in (select to_id from follow where from_id = #{memberId}) ) where num between #{start} and #{end}
SELECT hashtag FROM hashtag WHERE feed_no=#{feedNo}

select m.nickname as "nickname", f.file_no as "fileNo", f.file_data as "fileData" from member m join upload_file f on m.file_no = f.file_no where m.member_id = (SELECT member_id FROM feed WHERE feed_no = #{feedNo})
SELECT file_no AS "fileNo" FROM upload_file WHERE feed_no=#{feedNo}

select r.reply_no as "replyNo", m.nickname as "nickname", r.feed_no as "feedNo", r.reply_content as "replyContent", r.reply_date as "replyDate", f.file_no AS "fileNo" from reply r join member m on r.member_id = m.member_id left join upload_file f on f.member_id=r.member_id and f.feed_no is null where r.feed_no = #{feedNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM like_table WHERE feed_no=#{feedNo}
select nickname from member where member_id in(select from_id from follow where to_id=#{memberId})
select nickname from member where member_id in (select to_id from follow where from_id=#{memebrId})
select file_data from upload_file where feed_no in (select feed_no from feed where member_id= #{memberId} )
select hashtag, count(*) as cnt from hashtag where hashtag like #{keyword} group by hashtag
SELECT last_number FROM all_sequences WHERE sequence_name = 'FEED_NO_SEQ'

select file_no as fileNo, feed_no as feedNo, file_data as fileData, file_name as fileName, file_size as fileSize, file_type as fileType, member_id as memberId from upload_file where file_no = #{fileNo}

select file_no as fileNo, file_data as fileData,feed_no as feedNo from upload_file where file_no in(select max( file_no) as fileNo from upload_file where feed_no in( select feed_no from upload_file where member_id=#{memberId}) group by feed_no)
select feed.feed_no as feedNo, f.file_no as fileNo from feed join upload_file f on feed.feed_no = f.feed_no where feed.place_detail = #{placeDetail}
select count(*) from like_table where feed_no = #{feedNo}

select feed_no as feedNo, member_id as memberId, feed_content as feedContent, upload_date as uploadDate, feed.place_detail as placeDetail, place.place_title as placeTitle from feed join place on feed.place_detail = place.place_detail where feed_no = #{feedNo}
